title: IN GAME MIC CHAT
body: Hey guys have we ever thought of having in game mic ? so we can chat to our team etc

replies.body: I don't even want to read what my team types, why would I want to listen to their whiny autist voices?
i understand but you can easily mute them if they are out of order

Maybe not a full-time mic system, but maybe with pre-made groups or even just friends (which are usually the same thing anyway). That would be better then listening to every other player raging at their team mates for feeding and such.

Have you ever played league of legends on the OCE server? Its ridden with flamers and people threatening to kill your parents. Half of them dont even speak english, they are asian players using google translate. Having a mic system in place would increase arguing in game by a factor of 10. If riot ever implement a mic system im quitting league.
listening to a 12 y/o white kid flame is lmaoworthy
